name: Gray knowladge
description:
Backtrace Jam submission

In browser play:

* Use fullsreen mode.

* Make sure browser tab scale and windows screen scale is 100%.

The game is designed strictly for two players. The first player makes associations - hints, and the second one searches for hidden objects, following the prompts in the spirit of the board game "Imagenarium".

You can play both on the same computer with your family and over the network. You can see the full rules in the main menu of the game.

The game does not use third-party assets - All art, code and sounds were created on our own.

The game was made by 4 people in 56 hours.

Rules:

First Player

1. Choose cards - associations so that the second player can guess.

2. Press "GO" and see how your friend is guided by your tips.

• Playing on one computer make sure the second player does not see how you think associations.

• After the end of the game, you you can swap places.

----------------------------

Second Player

1. Wait until the first player will come up with associations. 

2. Look at the first card in your hand and find the object, which the first player thought.

3.  Selectthe object and click "E". If you have guessed right then the second card will open.

4. Each new objectis is in sight from the previous one,don't run far!

5.If you are wrong, you have to start over.
